law.text: Societies shall be subject to the provisions of KRS 304.2-210, 304.2-220, 304.2-230, 304.2-240, 304.2-250, 304.2-260, 304.2-270, 304.2-280, 304.2-290, 304.2-300, and Subtitle 2 of this chapter for determining financial condition, market conduct, and business practices.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 34, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 28, effective January 1, 1989.
